Container.Name: linkwarden

Config.Name: Disable Registration
Config.Description: If set to true, registration will be disabled.

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_CREDENTIALS_ENABLED
Config.Description: If set to true, users will be able to login with username and password.

Config.Name: NEXT_PUBLIC_EMAIL_PROVIDER
Config.Description: If set to true, email will be enabled and you'll need to define the next two variables below.

Config.Name: EMAIL_FROM
Config.Description: The email that will send the verification emails.

Config.Name: EMAIL_SERVER
Config.Description: That sensitive string that starts with smtp://...

Config.Name: PAGINATION_TAKE_COUNT
Config.Description: The numbers of Links to fetch every time you reach to the bottom of the webpage

Config.Name: STORAGE_FOLDER
Config.Description: The folder to store your Screenshot's, PDF's, and profile photos.

Config.Name: AUTOSCROLL_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: The amount of time to wait for the website to be archived (in seconds).

Config.Name: RE_ARCHIVE_LIMIT
Config.Description: Adjusts how often a user can trigger a new archive for each link (in minutes).
